name: Gillette Mach3  Cartridge
description:
Gillette MACH3 men’s razor blade refills feature stronger-than-steel blades that stay sharper longer, with sharper blades, it is engineered to last for 15 comfortable shaves.
These Gillette razors feature a lubrication strip that glides to help protect your skin from redness, and a microfin skin guard that stretches the skin, and prepares hair to be cut. MACH3 Sensitive refills fit with any MACH3 razor. *Images for illustration purposes only. Product received may vary.
